programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suddenly Human
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 176 On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Remember Me
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 179 Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Legacy
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 181 When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf re-unites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Future Imperfect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 182 Riker has to quit his birthday party during a so-far uneventful patrol voyage at the Neutral Zone to head an away team when a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Final Mission
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 183 Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Loss
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 184 As an unknown force drags the Enterprise, Deanna Troi struggles with the loss of her powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Data's Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 185 Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Wounded
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 186 After being fired upon by a Cardassian vessel, Picard races against time to find out the facts behind the Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Devil's Due
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 187 While answering a distress call, Picard finds himself not sure of exactly who he is dealing with, but he's sure he's NOT dealing with the planet's version of The Devil, as she claims to be.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Clues
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 188 Effects of passing through a wormhole give the Enterprise crew a sense that they were unconscious for more than the thirty seconds they've been led to believe.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - First Contact
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 189 Commander William Riker has been on an acculturation mission under an alias for months on the Arkonian planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Galaxy's Child
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 190 While the Enterprise is in a star-base, Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge gets a very special visitor, brilliant engineering designer Dr. Leah Brahms, who he feels to know almost intimately as a 'hologram version' of herself with 'whom' he bonded.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Till Death
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 After 300 years, Gina and Robert de Valicourt's marriage is on the rocks.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Judgment Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Dawson's life is on the line when the Watchers try him on the charge of treason for his friendship with MacLeod.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Invaders
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Penny For Your Thoughts
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Twenty-Two
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Odyssey of Flight 33
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Mr. Dingle, the Strong
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Static
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 An old radio is taking bitter bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a happier time before what he considers worthless tripe on television when he starts picking up radio programs from the 1930's and 1940's.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Prime Mover
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A compulsive gambler cajoles his friend to use his telekinesis to affect the results of the gambling tables in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E19 - We're So Screwed, Part 1: Fetal Attraction
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 The crew goes after Aeryn on a Scarran controlled station.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E20 - We're So Screwed, Part 2: Hot To Katratzi
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 Moya arrives at Katratzi. Crichton attends the peace talks between the Scarrans and the Peacekeepers with a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E21 - We're So Screwed, Part 3: La Bomba
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Scorpius has betrayed the crew. Now they're all captured. Their plan failed, the crew has little choice but to help Scorpius's true agenda.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E22 - Bad Timing
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 With their Crystherium stores low, the Scarrans must travel to Earth through a wormhole as those flowers grow there.

programme.title: Replicant - Replicant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Mardi Gras
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Mardi Gras is the biggest party of the year in Southern Louisiana, and it doesn't just happen in New Orleans. Terrebonne Parish is home to the second biggest Mardi Gras in the state.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Hunt for the Swamp Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The local shrimpers in Terrebonne Parish are notorious for handling their own problems and don't like interference from the cops.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Geaux Speed Racers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Terrebonne Parish can be a tough place for teenagers to find weekend entertainment, so deputies will investigate all sorts of calls involving the bayou's most troublesome kids.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - The Great Swamp Escape
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In Terrebonne Parish, the shrimping season is about to get underway as fishermen are getting their trawl boats ready and stretching out their nets.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Nightwatch - When Work Becomes Family

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Fallen Brother

programme.title: I Lived with a Killer - Classified Ad Rapist
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Cynthia Bartlett is married for six years to serial killer and rapist Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A night shift depends into chaos for the cops, one officer is hit with racial abuse, and a member of the public destroys potential evidence.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 6
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A woman has a very bad hair day, a man is talking tough to the cops, and a police dog gets to sink his teeth into suspected, hidden criminals.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Bobby Joe Long
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Bobby Joe Long is an American serial killer and rapist who terrorised the Tampa Bay Area in Florida during 1984. During his eight-month sadistic killing spree, he murdered ten women.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Robert Berdella - KCB
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Robert Berdella was an American serial killer, known as The Kansas City Butcher, who was responsible for drugging, raping, torturing and murdering six young men.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad ATL - The Cooler
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 A DNA hit in the Bridget Shiel murder investigation identifies a compelling new suspect who was recently imprisoned for a double homicide--Christopher Spencer.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad ATL - Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A beautiful teenager is found naked and shot to death in a city park. With no evidence to work with, rookie detective Andre Lowe struggles to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Grim Sleeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 123 The story of a manhunt, which lasted nearly three decades. How the killer identified and then murdered his victims…. And how the revolutionary science of DNA eventually led to his capture.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Toxic Web of Deceit
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 124 The story of the excruciating and sudden death of a healthy 60-year-old woman and how detectives traced the killer, despite their calculated and elaborate web of deceit.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Lured to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 125 A killer stalks and gains his victim’s trust, and investigators keep the case open for almost two decades, until scientific advances allow them to bring the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: The First 48 - Devil's Candy (#23)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Soon after discovering a bullet-ridden body in the Overtown section of Miami, Sgt. Joe Schillaci learns the murder may spark a bloody turf war between rival heroin dealers in the neighborhood.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fallen / Texas Burning (#26)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In Miami, a young man's body is found next to a high-rise, a victim of an apparent suicide. But the investigation takes a twist when Sgt. Joe Schillaci discovers signs of a struggle on the victim's body.

programme.title: The First 48 - Murder in the Driveway / Double Shooting in the Beans (#25) (2005)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 In a case of young man shot dead in Little Haiti, Miami Detective Ervens Ford and his team learn the suspected killer is a member of a notorious gang. The team must hunt him down, before he flees the country.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - By Inferno's Light
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 Led by Gul Dukat, Cardassia joins the Dominion and prepares to take over the Alpha Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Doctor Bashir, I Presume
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 When Bashir is chosen as the model for Starfleet's holographic doctor program, the process threatens to expose a dark secret from his past.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - A Simple Investigation
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 Odo falls in love with a mysterious woman who has been targeted for murder.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Business As Usual
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 Quark accepts a position working for an arms dealer to erase his debts.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Ties Of Blood And Water
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 The imminent death of Kira's Cardassian "father" rekindles painful memories of losing her real father.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Ferengi Love Songs
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Quark sacrifices his mother's happiness to regain his standing in Ferengi society.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Soldiers Of The Empire
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 On a mission for the Klingon Empire, Worf realizes that his friend General Martok is no longer fit to lead.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Children Of Time
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 Sisko and the Defiant crew must choose between the lives they have always known and the lives of their own descendants.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Blaze Of Glory
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 Sisko attempts to force his traitorous former officer to stop a final Maquis attack that could lead to the destruction of the Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Empok Nor
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 24 O'Brien, Garak, Nog, and a salvage team are stranded on a supposedly abandoned Cardassian space station.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - In The Cards
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 Jake and Nog risk an intergalactic incident in an innocent quest to lift Sisko's spirits.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Call To Arms
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 Deep Space Nine prepares to face a Dominion/Cardassian attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - A Time To Stand
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 Sisko and his crew embark on a secret mission in a captured Jem'Hadar warship.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.
